assembly_tools.description: Tools for composing model stacks and deploying nodes

tools.description: Create a stack of models working together
tools.name: create_model_stack

parameters.models: array (required) - List of models with roles
parameters.name: string (required) - Stack name
parameters.orchestration_mode: string (optional) - sequential, parallel, router, ensemble, pipeline

tools.description: Create a deployable node assembly from a stack
tools.name: create_node_assembly

tools.description: Deploy an assembly to the ICO network
tools.name: deploy_assembly
tools.returns: Deployment ID, node ID, and LD address

tools.name: list_deployments
tools.returns: List of deployments with health and metrics

when_to_use: Combining multiple models for complex tasks
workflow: 2. Create a model stack with roles and orchestration
3. Create a node assembly targeting a specific LD
